title: Lagging
body: So Ive played for about 8 months, and this game is fun as hell. Yet, recently Ive had lag spikes starting this August. I'll be fighting 1v1 and die when i freeze when it becomes a 3v1. No Im not making excuses as i have button mashed when I was ahead and gotten a triple the same way. Its just super annoying. Same wifi and data plan as January! I had high quality since January, but now i lagg spike at medium low quality! i disabled eye candy and done a ton of trial and errors! I just cant seem to get it to stop laging. What can i do to reduce this? Is this due to recent patches?

replies.body:
Can you test on a wired connection to see if you still experience the issue? While WiFi is convenient, it doesn't always offer a stable connection, which League relies **heavily** upon. 

Let me know if using a wired connection changed the issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=6Hkvw02T,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-10T23:20:53.081+0000)
>
> Can you test on a wired connection to see if you still experience the issue? While WiFi is convenient, it doesn't always offer a stable connection, which League relies **heavily** upon. 
> 
> Let me know if using a wired connection changed the issue.

I tried a wired connection and it seemed to work for 3-4 games. Now its back to normal tho so it may have just been luck XD

That's interesting that it only seemed to work for a few games. I recommend taking a look at the rest of the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if there's anything else in there that may help resolve your issue.

Let me know the results of those steps.
You can't do anything but quit league honestly lol. They will never fix it. Everyone is having problems with League of Lag.
